channel.title: Problems to add drops plz help
channel.description:
Okey guys, im new to coding and i've used ''Deathlypvpz source and client'' its a (PI) source.
I tried to add drops to barrows cuzz i moved them and want em to drop barrow items instead of getting 5Kc and do it over and over again. This is the barrows for now : - http://prntscr.com/1507g5
Okey these are my Npc drop files. - http://prntscr.com/1507v1
Honestly i've tried alot already, i have no idea whats wrong.
If you want to help me, reply here or add me on skype : nielskeeeeeeeen I also have team viewer if needed.

item.title: Problems to add drops plz help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You will have to go into actionhandler/etc and remove all content related to barrows that involves their count etc

Read full topic
item.source: Problems to add drops plz help
